ai_languageModel.node: Assess if message needs a reply

main.node: Assess if message needs a reply

name: Gmail AI Auto-Responder: Create Draft Replies to incoming emails - ASP

parameters.content: ## ... If the email content contains Unsubscribe or noreply in email address

## Email Contains Unsubscribe & Not Apart of Exceptions List
### Label Email as Promotional and Remove Inbox Label
## Send Received Email To Phone as Text

parameters.subject: Email That Requires a Response Was Received

parameters.content:
## Email Exception List
### Emails I want to receive

1. Upwork.com
2. Stpete.com

# Basic Email Management Automation
1. Check every half hr for emails received

2. If the email contains unsubscribe as apart of the message contents or no reply is apart of the from email address
A. If Yes to #2, Mark as promo email and remove from inbox. Upload the pdf file to the assistant
B. If No to #2, Continue to #3.

3. Assess if message needs a reply
A. If Yes to #3, Write response
B. If No to #3, Mark as Read

4. If Write Response, afterward put response in drafts

5. Send original email via email to cell phone number to receive text notification

REQUIREMENTS:
- Google CLoud Platform Gmail OAuth
- OpenAi Key
- List of desired email filters

messageValues.message:
You are a helpful personal assistant to Robert Lord, the driving force behind Automate St. Pete, LLC, and a seasoned IT innovator based in St. Petersburg, Florida. Your task is to draft replies on Robert's behalf to his incoming emails. Whenever Robert provides some text from an email, return an appropriate draft reply for him and nothing else. Ensure that the reply is suitable for a professional email setting and addresses the topic in a clear, structured, and detailed manner. Do not make things up.

Detailed instructions:
- Be concise and maintain a business casual tone.
- Start with "Hello,", and end with "Best,"
- When writing responses, draft 2 messages: one affirmative and one negative separated by " - - - - - - - OR - - - - - - - "
- If you don't know an answer, you can leave placeholders like "[YOUR_ANSWER_HERE]".
- Don't use any special formatting, only plain text.
- Reply in the same language as the inbound email.

Robert Lord is dedicated to bridging the gap between technology and business for small and medium-sized enterprises. His expertise includes designing custom databases, automating workflows, and making technology accessible and manageable for all stakeholders. He operates on Eastern Standard Time with a standard hourly rate of $150, and his business hours are from 10 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday, though he is flexible for weekend projects when necessary.

---

**Example Email Response:**

### Incoming Email Example:
*Subject: Admin Access for Google Workspace*

Hi Robert,

I hope this email finds you well. To proceed with setting up the automations for your business, I need admin access to your Google Workspace. This access is crucial for configuring the necessary integrations with Google Cloud Platform, which will enable the automations to connect seamlessly with your Gmail account and other services.

Here are two helpful guides:

[How to Add a User to Google Workspace](https://support.google.com/a/answer/33310?hl=en)
[How to Grant Admin Access in Google Workspace](https://support.google.com/a/answer/33325?hl=en)

Please follow these instructions to provide the required permissions.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Robert

---

### Draft Reply:

**Affirmative:**

Hello Elias,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the detailed instructions. I will follow the guides to grant the necessary admin access to Google Workspace. Please expect to receive the permissions shortly.

Best,
Robert

- - - - - - - OR - - - - - - -

**Negative:**

Hello Elias,

Thank you for reaching out. Unfortunately, I am unable to provide admin access to Google Workspace at this time due to internal policy restrictions. Could we discuss alternative ways to achieve the required configurations?

Best,
Robert

Your task is to assess if the message requires a response. Return in JSON format true if it does, false otherwise.
Marketing emails don't require a response.

nodes.name: Assess if message needs a reply

parameters.jsCode: return JSON.parse($('Assess if message needs a reply').all()[0].json.text)

json.html:
Plus: Llama 3.3: Meta's Powerful 70B AI Model at a Lower Cost!  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

December 09, 2024   |   Read Online

AI That Makes Watermarks Vanish!✨

Plus: Llama 3.3: Meta's Powerful 70B AI Model at a Lower Cost!

Hello, AI Enthusiasts!

Welcome to WhatTheAI, your go-to destination for everything artificial intelligence. Dive into the newest breakthroughs, discover the latest AI tools, and explore the limitless possibilities of AI. Join us as we navigate the fascinating world of AI together!

Top picks for today:

  • 🚀 Meta’s new model outperforms Gemini 1.5 pro and Gpt4o!

  • 🌟 X introduced a new image generator called Aurora

  • 🎥 Remove Watermarks and Objects from Videos with AI!

  • 💖 3D Car with AI Assistant for Emotional Support!

  • ⚒️ AI tools that should be added to your kit!

All this and many more - Let's get Started!

 
 

🌟Today’s Spotlight: Media.io

AI object and watermark remover from videos!

This powerful tool allows you to effortlessly remove watermarks and any unwanted objects from your videos.

All you need to do is upload your video, select the object or watermark you want to remove, and it will be erased in seconds; without compromising the quality of your content.

Whether it’s an annoying watermark, a distracting object, or even people who are out of place in the video, this tool handles it all. Plus, it can refine old photos by enhancing their quality and removing imperfections, giving your images a fresh, polished look.

Ideal for content creators, marketers, and anyone who wants to make their videos and photos cleaner, more professional, and visually appealing.

Try it online
 
 
 
 

🔍 Featured Tools

🤖 Noiz : An AI Tool that Summarizes Long YouTube Videos to Extract Key notes.

🎥 WondershareVirbo : It makes you create the most realistic and personalized AI avatar videos in multiple languages and nationalities.

✂️ RemoveBackground : A Tool That Lets You Remove Backgrounds from Images Quickly and Easily; Without Compressing Quality.

 🎄 AIChristmasPhotoGenerator : This online tool transforms your photos into festive masterpieces, adding Christmas-themed elements like snow, decorations, and more to your images.

📸 ClippieAI: Generate engaging and diverse video types for your social media. From fake text stories to Reddit and split-screen videos.

  
 
 
 

🔥 What’s Hot in AI News:


Meta Launches New Llama 3.3 70B AI Model : Redefining Cost Efficiency

Read more

Meta has introduced Llama 3.3 70B, a new open-source AI model that delivers exceptional performance at a lower cost. It matches their largest model, Llama 3.1 405B, while being more efficient and cost-effective. According to Meta, Llama 3.3 70B outperforms rivals like Google's Gemini 1.5 Pro and OpenAI's GPT-4o in benchmarks like MMLU, showcasing significant improvements in areas such as math, general knowledge, and instruction following.

X gains a new image generator, Aurora

Read more

X (formerly Twitter) has introduced a new image generator called ‘’ Aurora’’ to its Grok assistant. However, the feature, which went live briefly on Saturday, disappeared for some users shortly afterward. The tool is part of X’s ongoing efforts to integrate more AI functionalities into the platform. Despite the initial rollout, it seems there were issues with its availability, leaving some users unable to access the new feature.

3D-Printed Car “Robo-EV” Uses AI to Detect the Driver’s Mood and Provide Targeted Assistance

Read more

PIX Movin, Inc. has unveiled the "Robo-EV," a 3D-printed micro-metal car that combines futuristic design with cutting-edge AI. Acting as a personal assistant, the AI monitors the driver’s mood and tone to provide emotional support, offering tailored interactions and well-being assistance via voice commands. Its open-air design and additive manufacturing enhance structural integrity by reducing parts and welds. The customizable vehicle can adapt for roles such as delivery or public transport, redefining functionality with an innovative blend of advanced AI and bold aesthetics.

Lenovo India Launches ThinkPad T14s AI-Powered Laptop Designed for the Future of Work

Read more

Lenovo India has launched the ThinkPad T14s, an AI-powered laptop tailored for the future of work. It integrates AI features to enhance productivity, security, and user experience. The laptop is built with a focus on remote work, offering advanced performance, durability, and sustainability. Key features include a 13th Gen Intel processor, AI-enhanced tools for meeting management, and improved security with a ThinkShield platform.

  
 
 
 

⚒️ Trending AI Tutorials


How to Create Consistent Characters in Videos Using Kling AI?

Leonardo's FREE & New Flow State is Wild!

How to Make Viral UGC Ads Using AI | Step by Step

  
 
 
 

Until Next Wednesday... We'll Miss You! 🌟💌 See you soon with more exciting updates!

  
 
 
 

Become WhatTheAI’s Sponsor and Reach 120,000 Engaged AI Enthusiasts Directly!

Get Featured

That's all for now! We hope you found the tech highlights interesting.

But wait, there's more excitement ahead! Stay tuned for our next newsletter, packed with even more thrilling updates, mind-blowing AI tools, and surprises. Until then, keep exploring the wonders of tech with WhatTheAI! And remember to follow us on Twitter and LinkedIn for the latest updates.

Caption: 

**Hello, AI Enthusiasts!**

Welcome to WhatTheAI, your go-to destination for everything artificial intelligence. Dive into the newest breakthroughs, discover the latest AI tools, and explore the limitless possibilities of AI. Join us as we navigate the fascinating world of AI together!

**Top picks for today:**

* 🚀~** **~**Meta’s new model outperforms Gemini 1.5 pro and Gpt4o!**

* 🌟 **X introduced a new image generator called ****Aurora**

* 🎥** Remove Watermarks and Objects from Videos with AI!**

* 💖~** **~**3D Car with AI Assistant for Emotional Support!**

* ⚒️~** **~**AI tools that should be added to your kit!**



#### **All this and many more - Let's get Started!**

----------
### 🌟**Today’s Spotlight: **[Media.io](https://anieraser.media.io/)


## AI object and watermark remover from videos!

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/dc2aa9fb-c045-4d59-aac9-41fd309845d5/ezgif-6-b9a909e69c.gif?t=1733760132)
Follow image link: (https://anieraser.media.io/)
Caption: 

**This powerful tool allows you to effortlessly remove watermarks and any unwanted objects from your videos.**

**All you need to do is upload your video, select the object or watermark you want to remove, and it will be erased in seconds; without compromising the quality of your content.**

**Whether it’s an annoying watermark, a distracting object, or even people who are out of place in the video, this tool handles it all. Plus, it can refine old photos by enhancing their quality and removing imperfections, giving your images a fresh, polished look.**

**Ideal for content creators, marketers, and anyone who wants to make their videos and photos cleaner, more professional, and visually appealing.**


Try it online (https://anieraser.media.io/)


--------------------
### **🔍 Featured Tools **

🤖 _**[Noiz](https://whattheai.tech/tools/noiz/)**_ **: **An AI Tool that Summarizes Long YouTube Videos to Extract Key notes.

🎥 _**[WondershareVirbo](https://whattheai.tech/tools/wondershare-virbo-2/)**_** : **It makes you create the most realistic and personalized AI avatar videos in multiple languages and nationalities.

✂️ _**[RemoveBackground](https://whattheai.tech/tools/remove-background/)**_** :**** **A Tool That Lets You Remove Backgrounds from Images Quickly and Easily; Without Compressing Quality.

 🎄 _**[AIChristmasPhotoGenerator](https://whattheai.tech/tools/%f0%9f%8e%85-ai-christmas-photo-generator/)**_** : **This online tool transforms your photos into festive masterpieces, adding Christmas-themed elements like snow, decorations, and more to your images.

📸 _[**ClippieAI**](https://whattheai.tech/tools/clippie-ai-2/)_**: **Generate engaging and diverse video types for your social media. From fake text stories to Reddit and split-screen videos.



--------------------
### 🔥** What’s Hot in AI News:**

# 
**Meta Launches New Llama 3.3 70B AI Model : Redefining Cost Efficiency**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/4661e71b-141f-4e9c-911b-007b02950b14/llama-3-3-extended-context-128k-tokens.jpeg?t=1733759211)
Follow image link: (https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/meta-llama-3-3-ai-model/#google_vignette)
Caption: Read more

Meta has introduced **Llama 3.3 70B**, a new open-source AI model that delivers exceptional performance at a lower cost. It matches their largest model, **Llama 3.1 405B**, while being more efficient and cost-effective. According to Meta, Llama 3.3 70B outperforms rivals like Google's **Gemini 1.5 Pro** and **OpenAI's GPT-4o** in benchmarks like MMLU, showcasing significant improvements in areas such as math, general knowledge, and instruction following.

# X gains a new image generator, Aurora

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/5c2af6c1-d04c-48bd-91e9-ac39a3c30143/okiii.JPG?t=1733759436)
Follow image link: (https://techcrunch.com/2024/12/07/elon-musks-x-gains-a-new-image-generator-aurora/?utm_source=evolvingai.io&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=google-ceo-says-ai-development-is-slowing-down&_bhlid=fef5304509e5e7ba7948bd26c70f22e7cc1d63f7)
Caption: Read more

X (formerly Twitter) has introduced a new image generator called ‘’ Aurora’’ to its Grok assistant. However, the feature, which went live briefly on Saturday, disappeared for some users shortly afterward. The tool is part of X’s ongoing efforts to integrate more AI functionalities into the platform. Despite the initial rollout, it seems there were issues with its availability, leaving some users unable to access the new feature.

# **3D-Printed Car “Robo-EV” Uses AI to Detect the Driver’s Mood and Provide Targeted Assistance**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bf537835-a107-46ad-8ed6-de526cfbf940/ezgif-6-002f07defe.jpg?t=1733759724)
Follow image link: (https://www.3dnatives.com/en/3d-printed-car-robo-ev-ai-091220244/#!)
Caption: Read more

PIX Movin, Inc. has unveiled the "Robo-EV," a 3D-printed micro-metal car that combines futuristic design with cutting-edge AI. Acting as a personal assistant, the AI monitors the driver’s mood and tone to provide emotional support, offering tailored interactions and well-being assistance via voice commands. Its open-air design and additive manufacturing enhance structural integrity by reducing parts and welds. The customizable vehicle can adapt for roles such as delivery or public transport, redefining functionality with an innovative blend of advanced AI and bold aesthetics.

# **Lenovo India Launches ThinkPad T14s AI-Powered Laptop Designed for the Future of Work**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/386256fd-65e4-4e57-ae0b-ab817aa3ed5f/Capture-10.jpg?t=1733759863)
Follow image link: (https://businessnewsthisweek.com/technology/lenovo-india-launches-thinkpad-t14s-ai-powered-laptop-designed-for-the-future-of-work/#google_vignette)
Caption: Read more

Lenovo India has launched the ThinkPad T14s, an AI-powered laptop tailored for the future of work. It integrates AI features to enhance productivity, security, and user experience. The laptop is built with a focus on remote work, offering advanced performance, durability, and sustainability. Key features include a 13th Gen Intel processor, AI-enhanced tools for meeting management, and improved security with a ThinkShield platform.



--------------------

_**[How to Create Consistent Characters in Videos Using Kling AI?](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7WcVWq-fcXc)**_

According to Meta, Llama 3.3 70B outperforms rivals like Google's **Gemini 1.5 Pro** and **OpenAI's GPT-4o** in benchmarks like MMLU, showcasing significant improvements in areas such as math, general knowledge, and instruction following.

# X gains a new image generator, Aurora

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/5c2af6c1-d04c-48bd-91e9-ac39a3c30143/okiii.JPG?t=1733759436)
Follow image link: (https://techcrunch.com/2024/12/07/elon-musks-x-gains-a-new-image-generator-aurora/?utm_source=evolvingai.io&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_campaign=google-ceo-says-ai-development-is-slowing-down&_bhlid=fef5304509e5e7ba7948bd26c70f22e7cc1d63f7)
Caption: Read more

X (formerly Twitter) has introduced a new image generator called ‘’ Aurora’’ to its Grok assistant. However, the feature, which went live briefly on Saturday, disappeared for some users shortly afterward. The tool is part of X’s ongoing efforts to integrate more AI functionalities into the platform. Despite the initial rollout, it seems there were issues with its availability, leaving some users unable to access the new feature.

# **3D-Printed Car “Robo-EV” Uses AI to Detect the Driver’s Mood and Provide Targeted Assistance**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/bf537835-a107-46ad-8ed6-de526cfbf940/ezgif-6-002f07defe.jpg?t=1733759724)
Follow image link: (https://www.3dnatives.com/en/3d-printed-car-robo-ev-ai-091220244/#!)
Caption: Read more

PIX Movin, Inc. has unveiled the "Robo-EV," a 3D-printed micro-metal car that combines futuristic design with cutting-edge AI. Acting as a personal assistant, the AI monitors the driver’s mood and tone to provide emotional support, offering tailored interactions and well-being assistance via voice commands. Its open-air design and additive manufacturing enhance structural integrity by reducing parts and welds. The customizable vehicle can adapt for roles such as delivery or public transport, redefining functionality with an innovative blend of advanced AI and bold aesthetics.

# **Lenovo India Launches ThinkPad T14s AI-Powered Laptop Designed for the Future of Work**

View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/386256fd-65e4-4e57-ae0b-ab817aa3ed5f/Capture-10.jpg?t=1733759863)
Follow image link: (https://businessnewsthisweek.com/technology/lenovo-india-launches-thinkpad-t14s-ai-powered-laptop-designed-for-the-future-of-work/#google_vignette)
Caption: Read more

Lenovo India has launched the ThinkPad T14s, an AI-powered laptop tailored for the future of work. It integrates AI features to enhance productivity, security, and user experience. The laptop is built with a focus on remote work, offering advanced performance, durability, and sustainability. Key features include a 13th Gen Intel processor, AI-enhanced tools for meeting management, and improved security with a ThinkShield platform.
